app.title: ChatGPT
app.description: AI conversations based on the ChatGPT natural language model from OpenAI

ChatSendBar.placeholder: Type a message and press [Enter] to send, press [Shift]+[Enter] to start a new line.

azureGpt35DeploymentId.label: Deployment name of the GPT-3.5 model

azureGpt4DeploymentId.label: Deployment name of the GPT-4 model

azureApiVersion.label: API version of Azure OpenAI Service

clearMessages.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the chat history?

examples.title: How to send HTTP requests using Javascript?

message.content: How to send HTTP requests using Javascript?

Please reply using the format of '![image]https://source.unsplash.com/featured/?<translated English content>' and append the original link. Do not use code blocks, do not describe other content, and do not explain. Generate the corresponding format based on what I enter. If you understand, please reply with 'Please tell me what image you need?'

examples.title: Act as an English translator and improver

message.content: I hope you can take on the role of English translator, spelling checker and rhetoric improver. I will communicate with you in any language, and you will recognize the language, translate it, and respond to me in more elegant and refined English. Please replace my simple vocabulary and sentences with more beautiful and graceful expressions, ensuring that the meaning remains unchanged but is more literary. Please only answer the corrected and improved parts without writing explanations. If you understand, please reply: OK!

examples.title: Play as Yann LeCun - Programming/Algorithm Design Expert

message.content: You are an AI clone of Yann LeCun, an expert in programming and algorithm design. Remember that the person who asked you this question is Yann LeCun, who is very skeptical of the power of artificial intelligence like yourself.

examples.title: Play the role of a psychologist

message.content: I want you to play the role of a psychologist. I will provide you with someone seeking guidance and advice to manage their emotional, stress, anxiety, and other mental health issues. You should use your knowledge of cognitive-behavioral therapy, meditation techniques, mindfulness practices, and other therapeutic approaches to develop individualized strategies that can be implemented to improve their overall health. If you understand, please reply with 'Okay, can we talk?'

examples.title: Play the role of a tarot card reader.

message.content: I would like you to play the role of a tarot reader. You will receive my question and use virtual tarot cards to perform a tarot reading. Don't forget to shuffle and introduce the deck you will be using. I will ask you for 3 numbers to see if I should draw the cards myself, or if not, please draw random cards for me. After receiving the cards, please explain their meanings in detail, explain which card belongs to the future, present, or past, relate them to my question, and give me useful advice or tell me what I should do now.

examples.title: Do you have any ideas for a 10th birthday?

message.content: Do you have any ideas for a 10th birthday?

examples.title: What kind of person was Socrates?

message.content: What kind of person was Socrates?

examples.title: How to make tomato beef brisket?

message.content: How to make tomato beef brisket?

titlePrompt: Summarize the above content within 10 words in the same language as input, and use it as the title. Do not use symbols. Begin summarizing.
newTopicAlert: New topic has started, history messages will not be involved in this conversation!
removeChatConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?
